doc.field: BCI HOLDINGS TO SELL BOTTLED WATER DIVISION

- [BCI Holdings Corp] said its [Beatrice U.S. Food Corp] retained Shearson Lehman Brothers Inc to assist in the sale of its national bottled water business. It said products of the subsidiary, based in Monterey Park, Calif., are sold under the Arrowhead brand name in California and Arizona, the Ozarka name in Texas and the Great Bear name in 11 northeastern states.
